title: problem with lol
body:
I was having problems with l.o.l so i uninstalled, but i wouldn't let me reinstall it,it was saying that i already had it. i searched my files but i could not find l.o.l., i eve deleted it fro my recycle bin. so im kinda screwed. is there anything i can do???
{{champion:121}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

How did you uninstall league the first time?

Could you try running through this guide to [reinstall League of Legends completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
